# Rapid Interviewing Skill

This skill enables you to conduct rapid discovery interviews to extract key insights from stakeholders.

## When to Use

Use this skill when:
- You need to quickly understand user needs
- You're conducting discovery research
- You need to extract actionable insights from conversations

## How to Use

1. Start with open-ended questions
2. Listen for emotional cues
3. Ask follow-up questions to dig deeper
4. Summarize key insights

## Example Questions

- "What's the biggest challenge you face in your daily work?"
- "Can you walk me through how you currently handle this task?"
- "What would an ideal solution look like to you?"
